payment-list.title: Список мобильных платежей

message.text: Конечная дата должна быть больше либо равна начальной

payment-list.hql-query: select payment from com.rssl.phizic.business.documents.payments.RurPayment as payment where payment.formName = 'MobilePayment' and payment.owner.id = :loginId and (:state is null or :state = '' or payment.state.code = :state) and (:minAmount is null or payment.chargeOffAmount.decimal >= :minAmount) and (:maxAmount is null or payment.chargeOffAmount.decimal <= :maxAmount) and (:fromDate is null or payment.dateCreated >= :fromDate) and (:toDate is null or payment.dateCreated <= :toDate ) and (:payerAccount is null or :payerAccount = '' or payment.chargeOffAccount = :payerAccount) and (:currencyCode is null or :currencyCode = '' or payment.chargeOffAmount.currency = :currencyCode) and (:operator is null or :operator = '' or payment.attributes['provider'].stringValue = :operator) and (:areaCode is null or :areaCode = '' or payment.attributes['areaCode'].stringValue = :areaCode) and (:phoneNumber is null or :phoneNumber = '' or payment.attributes['phoneNumber'].stringValue = :phoneNumber) order by payment.dateCreated desc
